title: Satan From Beyond The Sky
description:
Description :
        From Null: Satan from Beyond the Sky is a Chinese comic by Shao Jie. Satan is in command of an infamous assassination team, Hell. Di Wu Tian is the Master of Peaceful Manor, possessing a mysterious power. These two heroes lead so different lives, yet they have more in common than one would expect. What does Fate have in store for them? Please read to find out!

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 2 : When The Two Heroes Meet
Chapter 1 : Satan From Beyond The Sky
